page.title: 17ONE DAY IN DAVIOT,INVERNESS.
page.content:
7.30a.m.-8a.m.--YAWN!-Dragged out of bed-clean up time for face and teeth.BRR!-cold water!Get dressed.
8.15a.m.-FOOD!--toast,cereal and tea.If mum has 'Bed and Breakfast' folk there may be sausage and bacon!
8.30a.m.-Get ready for school.Check homework is done!!Walk the dog.Run to the road end to catch the school taxi.
9a.m.-Arrive at school.Meet the gang!What shall we play at this morning?Mars?Tig? or just catch up on the gossip?
9.15a.m.-BELL RINGS--school begins for the eight to twelve year olds.The five to sevens have fifteen more minutes to play.
